title: Beyond Mars and Venus - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/22
itunes:title: Beyond Mars and Venus - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/22
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and relationship expert Dr. John Gray, author of the best selling book "Men Are From Mars-Women Are From Venus," explore his research into dating and relationships and ways for men and women to improve communication and deepen emotional bonds.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
